ComicInfo.Summary:
“Chasing Phantoms” Part 3! With an ally in danger, the Turtles look for a new way to defeat the Street Phantoms. Will the Turtles be able to do what it takes to save the Foot Clan?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dave Wachter | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Eric Jones | 3 | RE | Eastman Fun Club Edition Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 4 | RE | Anastasia's Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover | Alex Kotkin | 5-7 | RE | Heroes & Fantasies Exclusive Variant Cover | Rod Thornton | 8 | RE | Rhode Island Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 9 |
